description:
This mod decreases the grind to make your game easier.
Features:
Craft component kits
Trade component kits
More component kits from chests
A LOT more circuit boards from bots
A LOT more glue clams
More Paint Flowers
More Cotton
More Beewax
Cheaper Vacuum pumps and Water cannons
Devmode can be toggled using /lgdevmode and rejoining the world (lowercase L, not capital i)
Scrap Metal can be crafted from Metal 1
Metal 1 can be crafted from Metal 2
Metal 2 can be crafted from Metal 3
Faster refine times

More stuff comming soon!
name: Less Grind
